burnLotById(bytes32).details: Return the burn lot information at a given ID

params._burnLotId: The burn lot ID in question

burnLotById(bytes32).return: id of the lotThe address of the burn lot ownerPrimordial ion amount in the burn lot

burnLotIdsByAddress(address).details: Return all Burn Lot IDs owned by an address

params._lotOwner: The address of the burn lot owner

convertLotById(bytes32).details: Return the convert lot information at a given ID

params._convertLotId: The convert lot ID in question

convertLotById(bytes32).return: id of the lotThe address of the convert lot ownerPrimordial ion amount in the convert lot

convertLotIdsByAddress(address).details: Return all Convert Lot IDs owned by an address

params._lotOwner: The address of the convert lot owner

params._amount: The amount of primordial ions to burn
params._multiplierAfterBurn: The owner's weighted multiplier after burn

params._multiplierAfterConversion: The owner's weighted multiplier after conversion

createPrimordialLot(address,uint256,uint.details: Create a lot with `primordialAmount` of primordial ions with `_multiplier` for an `account`	during network exchange, and reward `_networkBonusAmount` if exist

params._multiplier: The multiplier for this lot in (10 ** 6)
params._primordialAmount: The amount of primordial ions to be stored in the lot

createWeightedMultiplierLot(address,uint.details: Create a lot with `amount` of ions at `weightedMultiplier` for an `account`
createWeightedMultiplierLot(address,uint.return: bytes32 of new created lot ID

lotById(bytes32).details: Return the lot information at a given ID
lotById(bytes32).return: id of the lotThe lot owner addressmultiplier of the lot in (10 ** 6)Primordial ion amount in the lot

lotIdsByAddress(address).details: Return all lot IDs owned by an address

params._lotOwner: The address of the lot owner

lotOfOwnerByIndex(address,uint256).details: Return the lot information at a given index of the lots list of the requested owner

params._index: uint256 representing the index to be accessed of the requested lots list
params._lotOwner: The address owning the lots list to be accessed

lotOfOwnerByIndex(address,uint256).return: id of the lotThe address of the lot ownermultiplier of the lot in (10 ** 6)Primordial ion amount in the lot

setAOIonAddress(address).details: The AO set the AOIon Address

setNameTAOPositionAddress(address).details: The AO set the NameTAOPosition Address

setWhitelist(address,bool).details: Whitelist `_account` address to transact on behalf of others

totalBurnLotsByAddress(address).details: Return the total burn lots owned by an address

params._lotOwner: The address of the burn lot owner

totalBurnLotsByAddress(address).return: total burn lots owner by the address

totalConvertLotsByAddress(address).details: Return the total convert lots owned by an address

params._lotOwner: The address of the convert lot owner

totalConvertLotsByAddress(address).return: total convert lots owner by the address

totalLotsByAddress(address).details: Return the total lots owned by an address

params._lotOwner: The address of the lot owner

totalLotsByAddress(address).return: total lots owner by the address

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfer ownership of The AO to new address

params._theAO: The new address to be transferred
